elements.title: Bright 6-year-old Karl uses his savings to buy a Nokia cell phone for CHF 70.

question2
elements.title: Decide whether Karl can legally conclude this contract. Put a cross in the appropriate box!
choices: Karl can legally conclude the contract.
Karl can only legally conclude the contract if the parents give their consent.
